title: FP91G
author: FP91G
content: TheMinerzCoin is a cryptocurrency and worldwide payment system. It is the first decentralized digital currency, as the system works without a central bank or single administrator.https://theminerzcoin.eu/Explorerhttps://explorer.theminerzcoin.euCoin Specifications POWhere is a small overview of the specifications of our coin.Algorithm - Scrypt Proof of Work and Proof of StakeCoin name - TheMinerzCoinCoin abbreviation - TMCBlock reward - 10 coinsLast PoW block - block 3600000Coinbase maturity - 20 ( + 1 default confirmation) blocksTransaction confirmations - 6 blocksTradehttps://xeggex.com/market/TMC_USDThttps://financex.trade/trading/tmcusdthttps://bimex.live/trade/index/market/tmc_usdtPools – Luckydogpool: https://luckydogpool.com/ – Wdspool: https://wsdpool.online/ – Cminer: https://cminer.org/ – Afinepool: https:/ /afinepool.xyz - Cпyлы: https://spools.online/ - Asic-Miners: https://pool.asic-miners.eu/ - Altcoinpool: https://yiimp.altcoinpool.ru/https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5466150.0

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on November 24, 2023, 12:03:34 PMIt is the first decentralized digital currency, as the system works without a central bank or single administrator.This part got me cracking up  Yep, all the other older cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin were never decentralized. Here is the first one ever. The creators of these coins. Do they even put any effort to be original these days?

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on November 27, 2023, 02:05:31 PMQuote from: FP91G on November 24, 2023, 12:03:34 PMIt is the first decentralized digital currency, as the system works without a central bank or single administrator.This part got me cracking up  Yep, all the other older cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin were never decentralized. Here is the first one ever. The creators of these coins. Do they even put any effort to be original these days? I agree with you that this is a shitcoin without a future, but on exchanges for miners such coins can be sold profitably.There is no big profit on standard coins now, so if new miners are interested, they can take risks. Many miners now want to mine for 10-20 cents of profit per day.
